channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Rodolfo's blog

item.title: About me
item.author: rodobarcaaa@gmail.com (Rodolfo Echemend√≠a Quintana)
item.description: def profile = { val pronouns = "He" -> "Him" val education = """üë®‚Äçüéì Computer Science Engineer's (Cuba-UCI / Class of 2011)""" val blogUrl = "https://rodobarcaaa.github.io/" val askMeAbout = ("tech", "webdev", "soccer") val technologies = for { backend <- { val java = "My first programming language!" val scala = List("Play", "Slick", "Tapir", "Sangria", "Cats") val python = "Learning FastApi!‚ö°" val node = "Learning NestJs!" java +: scala :+ python :+ node } database <- List("MySQL", "PostgreSQL", "Redis", "MongoDB") devops <- List("Docker", "AWS", "CI/CD", "Github Actions") } yield println(List(backend, database, devops).
